Package io.permazen.cli.jshell

package io.permazen.cli.jshell
Classes relating to integration betweeen the Permazen command line interface (CLI) and the Java Console Toolkit's jshell command.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.permazen.cli
    Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
    io.permazen.cli.app
    Support for Permazen command line interface (CLI) applications.
    io.permazen.cli.cmd
    Permazen CLI Command related classes, including pre-defined commands.
    io.permazen.cli.config
    Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
    io.permazen.cli.main
    Support classes for building standalone Permazen CLI applications.
    io.permazen.cli.parse
    Permazen parsing related classes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    PermazenExecutionControl
    Permazen-aware LocalExecutionControl.
    PermazenExecutionControlProvider
    A LocalContextExecutionControlProvider that creates PermazenExecutionControl's.
    PermazenJShellCommand
    A version of the JCT JShellCommand that is Permazen aware.
    PermazenJShellShell
    A version of the JCT JShellShell that is Permazen aware.
    PermazenJShellShellSession
    A version of the JCT JShellShellSession that is Permazen aware.
